- Select a cell with a variable name to see required formats, units, or accepted levels

- Cells of categorical variables contains drop down options  

- Errors or warnings will appear if a values is not formatted correctly  

- Helpers may be turned off by using the data validation option in Excel (see [this Microsoft help page](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/apply-data-validation-to-cells-29fecbcc-d1b9-42c1-9d76-eff3ce5f7249) for more information on data validation in Excel)
